hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Underwater Front Ches: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Market#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Huge Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Forest Temple#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bow#.
